directions: Mix cantaloupe, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, yellow bell pepper, jalapeno peppers, lemon juice, lime juice, and garlic together in a bowl. Add enough olive oil to moisten the salsa; season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until chilled and flavors have combined, 1 to 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Easy Cantaloupe Salsa
